content: Don't forget to fill out your Pre Connectathon Survey here: https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/3KB3GKR

Hey Connectathon 27 Participants! If you haven't filled out the pre connectathon survey yet today is the last day to actually be "pre connectathon" :-) Please fill this out - takes 4 minutes. https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/J3253W5
